name: Empty Corridors
description:
We didn't manage to finish the game play, but will be pushing updates for the rest of the week.

The project is open source and can be found at https://github.com/thomasdavis/emptydoors

Enemies are constantly spawning, and you have to recruit people to your team by running into them.

All enemies have unique generated bios by GPT-3 and will have a stochastic discussion with you. After a random amount of messages, the engine will ask them to join your team. If they like you enough and the GPT-3 gods are on your side, they will join your team and fight for you.
